name: Asset Stealers
description:
Asset Stealers

You successfully stole all the assets. Now run and protect yourself from other stealers! Use ANYTHING you can to save yourself!

This is a game for DGA IGSI Game Jam 2021, themed "Unconventional Weapon".

Tutorial

UP_ARROW/DOWN_ARROW - Use these keys to change lane

SPACE - Use this key to use your Asset

This bar will fill every time you use a weapon. Don't let it full!

Creator - Zakirahen GameDev

Wahyu Mahendra (Artist) - Jakarta

Dennis Indrawan (Programmer) - Jakarta

Fauzan Rahman Gautama (Sound Engineer) - Bandung

Harryanto (Game Designer) - Jakarta

Asset Attribution

SFX Footstep Rumble
